display_long_description:
🔥 HORDE MODE UPDATE – Play solo or with 1-4 players! 🔥

**Enhanced for Meta Quest 3 & 3S**

The Horizon scientific research laboratory is a deceptively quiet place. When you came round, there were hundreds of the living dead all around you.

**FEATURES**

* Full-size Campaign game mode;
* Various Firearms and Melee weapons;

[media]

* Mixed Reality game mode for Quest 2 and Quest 3, 3S devices;
* Enhanced for Meta Quest 3 and 3S;

[media]

* Multiplayer co-op game for 2 players;
* 8 Challenges - additional game modes for solo or co-op game;

[media]

To survive and save the world from the virus, use both hands and your head: never stop shooting, pick up rounds, climb up pipes and ladders, jump onto bars and grab hold of ropes, search cupboards and throw everything you find at the zombies.

[media]

You’re free to choose whatever weapons and tactics you want. Prove your agility, imagination and accuracy.

The denizens of the Horizon station will punish you for one thing: hesitation...

**Additional:**

●  Total action: packed of shooting, guns, bullets and enemies.

●  Freedom of movement: use your surroundings to survive.

●  All the decisions are yours: play the game the way you decide.

●  Use two controllers actively: fire with both hands, fire as you hang on a rope, reload your shotgun with your second hand, grab onto pipes and explore hard-to-reach areas of the station.
